msbt.message: ! It's Festivale!That special time that shimmies our way just once a year!I'm all ABOUT dancing and sparkling and all that. This holiday is basically made for me, !

Guess what! No, wait, I'll just tell you. I caught a GORGEOUS feather from the sky. How magical is that?Do you think the spirits of pop stardom dropped it down just for me? GASP! It's like a fairy tale!I've got a LOT of dreaming to do about all this. You should grab your net and try to catch feathers too!
So I was getting my Festivale on, when suddenly I saw .That feather set off ALL of my style alarms. I gotta have one! If you catch one you don't want, wellI want it!

GAH! WOW! OHMIGOSH! You look STUNNING in that outfit. So flashy! So fun! It's like looking in a mirror.Ooh, I have a great idea! We both look so snazzy, we should TOTES dance together. It'll be a blast!
Look at YOU! Someone's a Festivale star. Your outfit looks seriously amazing, .In fact, you're so stylish, we may just have to do a duet before the day is over. Now I'm excited!
Tee-hee! I'm having WAAAY too much fun. Festivale has the power to bring joy to everyonejust like me!
WAHOO! When you think of dancing, my sparkling face comes to mind, right? It's only natural.I already practice dancing every day, so this is my big chance to show off! My spotlight is waiting for me!
I'm having zero luck finding any rainbow feathers. I'm trying to charm the sky, but it's not working yet.Where is lady luck when you need her? Festivale is no time to sleep on the job, lady!
Dance with me! The only way to mess it up is to not dance at all.Today's about finding your groove and groovin' until you can't groove anymore. How fun is that?
How's it going? Having fun yet? Technique's nice, but all that really matters is that you have a blast!
Someone isn't wasting any time getting their dancing shoes on, !That is IT. I'm officially inspired. The hype train leaves the station NOW!
Wondering if I'm losing steam? Pfft! Not possible! I'm just getting started!
It doesn't matter how late it is. Dancing around the clock is totes my thing, !
Everyone's in full Festivale mode out there. Even inside, I can FEEL their fabulousness. It's a gift.Bah, this is SO making me want to get back out there. I need to dance! Like, NOW.
Festivale is an all-day fun fest. You've gotta take little breaks now and then to keep the groove going!
Dancing's in my blood, so Festivale really gets my heart racing, .My body starts moving all on its own! It's like a horror movieâ€”but fab instead of scary.
We all know dancing is kiiiind of my specialty, but I'll admit, technique isn't everything.As long as you get out there and have the best time ever, you're a great dancer in my book!

Aren't rainbow feathers the fabbest? As if one color isn't already great, they have LOTS of colors!It just screams SPECIAL. I like special stuff, so maybe I'll go for a walk later and try to catch one.
I've been at maximum excitement since I first woke up today. Why? Duh! It's FESTIVALE!I can tell you're already in full-on party mode too. We're two of a kind, !
It's nice to see everyone celebrating. We're all having so much fun, -style!I just hope everyone's drinking lots of water and taking breaks. That's Pop Star 101, .
The whole island is really cutting loose today. I can feel their great energy from here!
Oh! ! Do I spy ?!I want it! I need it! I mean Want to trade that boring feather for my shiny ?
Sure thing!
No can do.
Stop EVERYTHING. Do you have ?You totally do, by the way. And you totally want to trade it for my super- special .
Let's do it!
I'm sorry, but...no.
Yes! YES! A thousand times yes! Let's hurry up and DO THIS THING!
That seriously worked? Hooray! This must be my lucky day!
Thank you thank you thank you! I promise to take extra-special care of this fabulousness, .
I'm SO happy right now. Like, way happier even than usual. I can't thank you enough, !
Wha? No trade? I Oh. OK. That's fine. I'm shocked, butI'll find a way to deal, .
Awwwww. That is WAY too bad. I'm a little sad, but don't worry about it. I wouldn't trade either, if I were you.
Just to be sure You want of my for of your ?
I sure do!
Actually, no.
